text: @SpeakerPelosi Nancy, thank you for helping Americans during Covid19.🙏I’m Praying for Democrats to win 2020🙏We need daily prayer to God like never before. Here’s His words: (Psalm 33:12) Blessed is the nation whose God is the Lord”(Psalm 9:17)
